name: Lemony Edamame Power Pasta
description: For those nights when meal planning goes sideways, count on pantry staples. That bag of frozen edamame, that can of beans, and those last bits of pasta are “fork-tastic,” bathed in a lemony-sesame sauce that starts with a salad dressing mix! So, fuel up and feel good—each serving dishes up 20 g of protein which is essential for muscle growth, heart health, and weight maintenance.

ingredients.name: white kidney beans or cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
Sesame Ginger Dressing Mix, Sesame Noodle Salad Dressing Mix, or Nourish Broth Mix

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta in boiling water according to package directions. Add edamame for final 30 seconds of cooking, then drain.
Add beans to a blender with broth, oil, and dressing mix. Slice lemon in half; squeeze in juice. Blend on high until smooth, about 1 min, scraping down the sides of the blender as needed.
Toss sauce with pasta. Divide into bowls and top with seeds and topper blend, if desired.
tips: Swap sunflower seeds for leftover chicken or canned fish.
Feeling the squeeze on fresh lemons? Swap 1⁄4 cup bottled lemon juice.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and a squeeze of lemon juice.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
